summary: Consume the Bubble Data API to perform operations like creating, deleting, getting, and updating objects.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to perform operations on.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the selected resource.

parameters.name: typeName
parameters.description: Name of the data type of the object for the operation.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Add properties for the object to create.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: ID of the object to perform the operation on.
